DOC.brief_summary: Enhanced External Counterpulsation ( EECP ) therapy may promote recovery visual function improve blood perfusion eye . The present study aim investigate effect EECP Anterior Ischemic Optic Neuropathy .
DOC.brief_title: Effect EECP Anterior Ischemic Optic Neuropathy
